Name: Santa Girls
About the game: A Christmas themed adult romance visual novel, following a male protagonist as he takes a job managing Santa's female helpers in Paradise Cove's new super market. Will you be able to make the Christmas event a success and possibly find love along the way, your decision will determine the games outcome, with a large variety of choices to make that will change the games events and final ending. The game features four female characters to get to know whilst working. Game Features Multiple Endings and routes through the game Special Secret Endings to unlock, such as the Harem Ending. Extra Special After Credits Epilogue to Uncover Build Romantic Relationships with the Girls or just have a fling. Amazing Artwork Illustrations and a Gallery of images to unlock.
Meta Title: Santa Girls: Dec 6, 2019, Dharker Studio and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Santa Girls? Check out the release date (Dec 6, 2019), developer insights from Dharker Studio, and a complete game summary.
